DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to compare sensitivity and sensitization of visceral pain in the esophagus using different pain stimuli
DOC.brief_title: Esophageal Hypersensitivity Study in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Provision of written consent Clinically normal physical findings Sensitization potential Clinically significant illness within 2 weeks prior to the first dose of investigational product History of clinically significant disease Use of prescribed medication during the 2 weeks before administration of the first dose of investigational product
